original_text: Kenaniah was the leader of the musicians. They chose him to do that because he had good skill in music.
korean_text: 레위 사람의 지도자 그나냐는 노래에 익숙하므로 노래를 인도하는 자요

sentences.original_text: Kenaniah was the leader of the musicians.
They chose him to do that
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 그 일을 위해 선택했습니다.

sentences.original_text: because he had good skill in music.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 음악에 좋은 기술을 가지고 있었기 때문입니다.
